questions:
What is the photo about?
A) Nature and landscapes
B) Daily life and people
C) Art and culture
D) Shadows and light

Where was the photo taken?
A) In a city park
B) At the beach
C) Inside a house
D) In a residential area

What situation does the photo depict?
A) A peaceful nature scene
B) A sports event
C) A shadow cast on a door
D) A family gathering

What is mainly focused on in the photo?
A) A person
B) A shadow
C) A landscape
D) An animal

What is in the center of the photo?
A) A tree
B) A door and a shadow on that
C) A car
D) A table

What is in the background of the photo?
A) Mountains
B) A forest
C) A wall
D) A beach

What is in the foreground of the photo?
A) A shadow
B) A flower
C) A lake
D) A painting

What is the relationship between the shadow and the door?
A) The shadow is cast on the door
B) The shadow is behind the door
C) The shadow is next to the door
D) The shadow is in front of the door

What is the shadow doing?
A) Pointing
B) Waving
C) Flexing
D) Running

What can be seen on the door?
A) A window
B) A doorknob and a shadow
C) A painting
D) A sign

What is the color of the door?
A) Blue
B) White
C) Brown
D) Green

How many remote controls are visible in the photo?
A) One
B) Two
C) Three
D) None

Is the shadow of a person or an object?
A) Person
B) Object

What is the shadow's arm position?
A) Raised and bent
B) Straight down
C) Crossed
D) Holding something

What is the door made of?
A) Glass
B) Wood
C) Metal
D) Plastic

What is the texture of the door?
A) Smooth
B) Rough
C) Textured
D) Patterned

What is the shape of the panels on the door?
A) Circular
B) Rectangular
C) Triangular
D) Oval

What is the shadow's hand position?
A) Open
B) Closed
C) Pointing
D) Waving

What is the condition of the door?
A) New
B) Old
C) Dirty
D) Clean

What can be seen on the left side of the photo?
A) A plant
B) A piece of furniture
C) A piece of wood
D) A window

What is the photo's orientation?
A) Landscape
B) Portrait

What is the position of the doorknob?
A) Top
B) Middle
C) Bottom
D) Left

What is the main theme of the photo?
A) Light and shadow
B) Colors
C) Movement
D) Textures

What is the style of the door?
A) Modern
B) Classic
C) Rustic
D) Industrial

What is the material of the remote controls?
A) Metal
B) Plastic
C) Wood
D) Glass

What is the color of the remote controls?
A) White
B) Black
C) Red
D) Blue

What is the shadow's head position?
A) Tilted
B) Straight
C) Down
D) Up

What is the shadow's relationship to the light source?
A) Directly in front
B) To the side
C) Behind
D) Above

What is the height of the shadow compared to the door?
A) Shorter
B) Taller
C) Same height

What is the shadow's arm length compared to the door panels?
A) Shorter
B) Longer
C) Same length

What is the shadow's head size compared to the door panels?
A) Smaller
B) Larger
C) Same size

What is the shadow's hand size compared to the door panels?
A) Smaller
B) Larger
C) Same size

What is the angle of the photo?
A) Straight on
B) From above
C) From below
D) Sideways

What is the focus of the photo?
A) Sharp
B) Blurry
C) Out of focus
D) Soft

What is the brightness of the photo?
A) Bright
B) Dark
C) Dim
D) Medium

What is the color tone of the photo?
A) Warm
B) Cool
C) Neutral

What is the shadow's relation to the doorknob?
A) Above
B) Below
C) Touching
D) Beside

What is the person in the shadow doing?
A) Running
B) Pointing both sides, left and right
C) Sitting
D) Lying down
